forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. SE winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 56F. SE winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 54F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
